Name: I Trulli
Review Text: I wanted to like this place but I didn't.  Not the best Italian food I had. Plate was hot but food wasn't.  Super pricey.  Alot of people were ordering the fish. Maybe we just ordered the wrong thing. We all had pasta and we all did not enjoy it much. Wine , bread , dessert were great.

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: Very good experience at I Trulli. Went during restaurant week and the portion sizes were still very big.The stracciatella (mozzarella cheese with pickled eggplant) was delicious. The owner was also very nice. Will definitely be back!

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: Decided to come here for dinner one day and was really impressed. The staff were super friendly, the interiors was wonderful especially sitting near the fire place they had made me feel so warm and cozy. All the food I had there were ‚Ä¶

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: Service was great at the beginning of the meal but so-so after we ordered despite the place being empty. Food was good but we've had better food at places with far lower prices. I'm used to eating at an italian place in rural Pennsylvania ‚Ä¶

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: Really wonderful food in a welcoming environment. Every dish was truly outstanding. Seafood and rabbit are two major proteins in cuisine from Puglia so there are many great options on the menu. High recommend the rabbit ragu as well as the stratciatella appetizer.  The owner is also very knowledge about wines.

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: This place needs more stars, especially on Yelp. If you‚Äôre looking for authentic Italian food from Puglia - which is the heel region of Italy, you need to make your way here. ‚Ä¶

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: I have spent a lot of time in Italy both personally and for work and have a deep appreciation for Italian food and the various regions. From an atmosphere and ambiance perspective, I Trulli came across as old and a neighborhood place. Don‚Äôt ‚Ä¶

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: I love this restaurant. Their homemade pastas are delicious. I love supporting this warm, family run restaurant. I have been enjoying it for years. It is such a treat.

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: This place was good, but I was a bit disappointed to be honest. I had seen some photos on Instagram and Google, and I think I had built it up to be something it wasn't. ‚Ä¶

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: Ok I so went several years ago but the prices have stayed the same. Excellent value for the money. Super authentic food for the region.

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: Good bread basket with ricotta, solid pastas (we got lasagna and ravioli), but nothing about it was special - not seeing what the raves are saying.

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: We didn‚Äôt even try the food!! A large group of us decided to go here for dinner on Friday. My husband and I weren‚Äôt super hungry so we wanted to share an appetizer and a pasta special along with another couple - this clearly made the waiter ‚Ä¶

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: Best pasta I‚Äôve ever had!! So good!!! I come at least 2 times every time I visit NYC!

Name: I Trulli
Review Text:
We heard about i Trulli featured on a tv segment with home made pasta by Nonna Dora making it there for 30 years so we dined for our 13th wedding anniversary.
Started with mussels in white wine sauce. About 10 did not open. The kitchen ‚Ä¶

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: Great family style Italian food. Awe atmosphere and really good service!!

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: UNREAL... We had the absolute best dining experience and it wasn't just the food. The service was impeccable. I will be returning to I Trulli next time I am in NYC and bringing anyone I can to accompany me.

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: Wonderful and graceful service, beautiful seating both indoor and outdoor, plates are a bit pricey to be honest but they would pay off.

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: Dined here with my wife and son on a Friday night.  Sat in their outdoor garden room which was nice and warm because they employ multiple propane heaters.  Good wines by the glass.  I did not like the pulpo (octopus) appetizer, but the ‚Ä¶

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: The food was great and the staff were very friendly.  The pasta is fresh and delicious

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: Very good food as well as ambiance. Dish was a little bit salty. Great service!

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: My work had a large gathering here so my review will be targeted at a large catered event. ‚Ä¶

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: Menu was quite different than the one posted online. Food was just okay. Service mediocre.

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: Just got back from a Restaurant week dinner with friends. Awesome menu. Good service. Will go back again soon.

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: Great pasta and great hosts! Good kips bay joint.

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: So. Good. We were visiting from out of town and stopped by for an early dinner. We got there right before the dinner rush and all the tables were reserved except for one. Everything we ordered was delicious, including tiramisu for dessert. ‚Ä¶

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: Very disappointing. The dishes were just competent, not transporting; some not even that. NYC is blessed with great Italian restaurants, where eating pasta is communing with the divine, but the pasta that we had here -- tomatoes & rabbit ‚Ä¶

Name: I Trulli
Review Text:
The food is fantastic! We had the octopus salad (Pulpo), scallop crudo and I had the gnocchi. Cooked to perfection and flavors were üëå.
Covid-19 measures: outdoor space was plentiful, plenty of 2-tops and up to ‚Ä¶

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: Excellent food. Some of the best hand made pastas I've ever had. Nona Dora is there everyday hand making ask the pasta, and she is very approachable, and friendly. If you want Italian around the flat iron district, this place is a must try.

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: I wanted fresh pasta. I ordered the lasagna. Nothing special. My own lasagna is better. The pasta was overcooked. Portion was skimpy. I‚Äôm working in NY and just wanted something special. Very disappointed. My shake shake was far better for ‚Ä¶

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: I saw I Trulli on Food Insider and was very excited to try Dora Marzovilla's handmade pasta--I Trulli delivered! The atmosphere, food, and service are excellent. We celebrated my sister's birthday here, and the staff went above and beyond to make her dining experience memorable. Highly recommend!

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: The place is charming and homey but the food just wasn‚Äôt good. The seafood pasta dish was so fishy, meaning they probably used frozen shrimp. The sauces didn‚Äôt have much flavor. The only thing I really enjoyed was the free burrata cheese that came with the breadsticks. Not only was the food mediocre but overpriced as well.

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: I had a family member that used to work here about 5-6 years ago and when i visited her I thought it was excellent. I went back recently and was appalled at how bad it was. Service was terrible, the waitress must have been on Xanax or ‚Ä¶

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: One of the best Italian restaurants in NYC.  Thoughtful preparation from a great family owned and operated establishment.  This is not a red sauce, checkered table cloth, and big portions place.  Go for the quality and variety, and see Christopher for the right wine pairings.

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: Delicious pasta! Very nice ambiance!

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: Frustrating customer experience. Ordered online for pickup and when arrived in-store, manager(?) claimed the ordered items do not exist and was aggressive and rude. A kind waitress helped resolve the manager's attitude and lack of service. Will not come back.

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: This restaurant was designed like a living room with a fire place. Its nice and comfy. In the back they have a portion that looks patio-ish/green house. I tried a fixed course meal and it was good not great.  I want to boast about the ‚Ä¶

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: I Trulli helped to make my birthday TRULLI special! Our server - Dominic, I think- went above and beyond in making sure we were accommodated, and the manager or owner was sure to check on us as well. A smaller part of our group arrived ‚Ä¶

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: Hand made pasta by Nona right there.  Nice cozy ambience in the yard as well. Good service too. Food and wine were good as well. I'm taking off a star because the bathroom wasn't up to par with the rest of the place at all.

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: My wife and I had the pleasure of having dinner at this great restaurant last Saturday. We were warmly greeted and were seated at a quiet table in the back corner .The atmosphere is wonderful and the restaurant has a beautiful fireplace ‚Ä¶

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: My girlfriend and I had trouble finding a place to eat but were lucky enough to get reservations at I Trulli. First arriving there we definitely noticed we were the youngest in the crowd which didn't bother us but just felt a little weird. ‚Ä¶

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: Almost liked the plate clean! Cute garden in the back of the restaurant, great cocktails, fantastic short ribs over pecorino smashed potatoes. Owner was such a pleasure to talk with and I‚Äôll definitely be back!

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: Its OK.  I have had better Italian in the city.

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: The host (who appeared to be the owner, and I guess this excuses him for being so condescending when talking with customers) at the restaurant is extremely rude, disrespectful and unprofessional. He didn‚Äôt seat us and told us to either ‚Ä¶

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: WOW!!!!!!!  We absolutely loved this restaurant.  The service was excellent, the food was amazing and the place was so cute and comfortable.  The next time I am in Manhattan, I will be sure to make a special trip just to eat here again. ‚Ä¶

Name: I Trulli
Review Text:
Lovely service in a beautiful setting. The wine list is only Italian and those paisans cannot make a white that  doesn't taste like turpentine. Boo.
Expensive by the glass. My wife makes better lasagna. ‚Ä¶

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: I joined some friends for dessert on Saturday night. They said their dinner was EXCELLENT and I loved the dessert. The waitress was fun but not in your face, I loved my limoncello and the sorbet was really good.  Chocolate cake was to die for. I would totally come here again.

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: Rustic setting lends to memorable southern Italian dining experience. The garden is great for eating al fresco and a wood burning fireplace provides a comfortable ambiance during the colder months.The food was good. Nothing that blows you ‚Ä¶

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: Have been here a few times and I can comfortably say this is the best dining experience you can ask for from a resturant. Amazing food and really amazing service.

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: I visited because Nona Dora is a star in social media. It did not disappoint me. Pasta is perfect and authentic. Place is small but cozy. Late review, I visited in June. I had a picture with Nona. Thank you Ma‚Äôam!

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: Greatest food with exceptional service!

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: Great food, pasta, wine, dessert, Negronis, and a huge outdoor patio!

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: A NYC gem! This place has been around for about 25 years and not much has changed. The woners 83 year old mother (Dora) still hand rolls pasta every weekday during lunch service, bread is made twice a day and they even make their own ‚Ä¶

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: I've been here a few times and the food is absolutely delicious! Service is also top notch. Knocking a star for how pricy it is and last time I went a moth landed on our calamari. Otherwise looking forward to my next outing here.

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: Just off of Park Ave. in Murray Hill sits an Italian gem complete with a fire place and back garden. It‚Äôs a nice respite from the cheap Bud Lights to the east and post work watering holes on Park.  I Trulli is a great spot for some tasty ‚Ä¶

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: Fantastic experience!! Great cocktails, and even better food. We did takeout and it was all so delicious. Definitely going back

Name: I Trulli
Review Text:
Very pleasant interior, good waitstaff and very good food selection. Certainly worth a slightly higher pricing but cannot question the quality or portions.
Highly recommended.

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: I Trulli gets its name from the traditional homes in the bucolic Puglia region of Italy, famous for its tomatoes, olives and of course beaches.  Luckily, the restaurant doesn't attempt to duplicate the hackneyed "rustic charm" one often ‚Ä¶

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: The service was superb. I felt like family and was treated as such throughout my entire dining experience. This has become one of my favorite restaurants in Manhattan!

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: Great atmosphere, friendly staff. This review is for iTrulli's offers Enoteca to Go service which *was* offered from 11 am till 3 p.m. My favorite item is the egg & pepper sandwich - it's very filling and satisfying. A large coffee is less ‚Ä¶

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: Consistently delicious and no worse for being long-established, I Trulli never loses its ability to delight us with the most delicious and authentically Italian dishes. On my latest visit, I was offered my branzino on or off the bone and it was perfect. The home made pasta is second to none, too.

Name: I Trulli
Review Text:
Excellent Italian food, terrific service.   From beginning to end, coffee excellent.  Owner and wait staff very engaged and charming, provide excelllent service.  Wish this lovely restaurant was closer to us on the UES.
Still, worth the trip for every delicious morsel.

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: Food was mediocre at best.  I've had much better Italian food for less money in New York City.  Overpriced, small portions.  Mushrooms side dish was oddly bitter and inedible.

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: Superb neighborhood spot featuring authentic Puglian cuisine ‚Äî the wild boar rack plate is a must ‚Äî in rustic/chic digs and with a note-worthy Negroni menu to complement the pasta starters

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: Super friendly waiter that managed to accept a special request and deliver the exact dish I wanted. Thanks for the flexibility. The GF pasta was fab too!

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: While the food often has a rustic appeal - it is honest and quite good - the prospect of dining out in the lovely garden on a gentle Spring day or summer evening and sipping a glass of straw-colored wine from the extensive list makes this long-established spot a seductive delight.

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: I was really excited to eat at I Trulli, based on its high Zagat rating and all of the good reviews I read about it. ‚Ä¶

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: Very nice place. We celebrate our holiday party here and the pasta was delicious. Also, it was very nice that I could watch how they make the pasta.

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: outstanding old italian standard managed by a wonderfully attentive and charming owner. with a fireplace in winter and a back garden for the warmer months the room is always ideal. excellent wine list.

Name: I Trulli
Review Text:
The Food could have been better prepared unless We booked at home.
The Service was excellent friendly and courteous.

Name: I Trulli
Review Text:
Service took forever.
Servers focused on seeking you something expensive vs what you asked for.
Servers would not split the bill, nor setup split build in the first place. ‚Ä¶

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: Great Italian place, friendly staff

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: Very average food. not enough seasoning or flavor in the food, very bland overall experience.

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: Great food and service, a taste of Puglia Italy

Name: I Trulli
Review Text:
Thank you so much for a wonderful pandemic experience at I Trulli !!!
It had been a while since I last visited this institution and wow !
Food was on point and service was exemplary ‚Ä¶

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: It's a cozy atmosphere and the food is delicious! Went there for dinner with a couple of friends and we had a good time. Staff was really friendly!

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: I attended a wine tasting in the heated courtyard out back. Beautiful setting. The small buffet set up was delicious. I will return to try more.

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: My favorite Italian restaurant in NYC - excellent and simple food, homemade pastas (by an 80+ year old "gonna"), amazing wine list, and friendly, non-fussy service.

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: Been here twice - first time was underwhelmed, second time everyone raved about the food. I think the more recent experience is representative and am willing to suggest it for folks in the neighborhood.

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: Extremely overpriced for what you get. The wine is very expensive and disgusting and they could use a more talented cook. Service is good and decor is nice though. Will never return because I don't like to get ripped off.

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: Great restaurant!  Wonderful authentic food.  Romantic for the winter.  And refreshing during Spring & Summer.  Wonderful wine offerings as well!

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: I had a wonderdul time with my co-workers and the citizen staff for our holiday dinner. The food was delicious and the waiters were excellent.

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: Trulli mundane food. Specialty featured on Best Thing I Ever Ate, Rabbit Orecchiette, blah. A dish called Burnt Pasta, an embarrassment. Took an Italian friend from Italy here, by the grace of God, she's still speaking to me.

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: Great food and ambiance. Portions were on the small side, but maybe that‚Äôs just because it was the restaurant week menu.

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: Horrible experience - awful service, didn‚Äôt have 1/2 the items on their restaurant week menu

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: I read about I Trulli when it first opened many years ago and put off going there--do I regret it!  It was such a delight this first experience!!!  The food, service, atmosphere, attention of the staff was superb!!!!  We cannot wait to go back again!!!!!

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: Really loved the atmosphere and decor, and the food was incredible. Service was very quick and attentive and friendly.

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: Fabulous Italian specialties from the Puglia region. Beautiful presentation; attentive service. Interesting wine selection. A definite winner.

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: Expensive and the food is so so. Service is lacking. Order hot tea after lunch and a carafe of coffee is brought. Small portions.

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: Meatballs were served cold and replaced, main dishes were over salted. Tiramisu was disappointing.

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: Was there for a friends wedding.  Service was best....ever.  food was unique and tasty.  A must visit place

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: Overpriced for no reason. Felt like a tourist trap even though I am not a tourist and this is not really a touristy area.. Food and wine are just OK..

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: Food fab and only reason I did not give it a 5 is that it is a little pricey.  Very nice spot in this part of town and I try to go whenever I am there!

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: Classic italien that remains excellent. Nice fireplace, good bar and cocktails. Homemade pastas

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: Fantastic Italian restaurant near NoMad, great service. You'll leave absolutely stuffed, and with a warm glow

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: Perhaps there's no such thing as a real Italian restaurant in the US, the I Trulli comes close. Of course, it's more northern than from around the trulli in the southeast, but so what?

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: Incredibly delicious homemade pastas, great cocktails, friendly staff. Def going back.

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: If you know the people in there then you get great food and great service otherwise is just another restaurant in NYC ...

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: I Trulli is one of my favorite local Italian Food Restaurants I go to. Food is delicious and service is fantastic.

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: The butternut squash tortellini was amazing. The only thing I would change is the music.

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: Food excellent at lunch, but a few service missteps: slow to check on us after food was placed, slow to offer dessert and bring check, one drink order never came, coat check was completely unattended and unnoticed for nearly 10 minutes (!) after our meal.

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: Delicious food, cozy ambiance, service was a bit slow, but overall very enjoyable.

Name: I Trulli
Review Text: Best Italian in the gramercy area! Great homemade pasta and wine.

Review Text: Great atmosphere feels like Italy and the food is beyond the standard fare with  attentive reliable service.
